text: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: So the people that committed wrong were eliminated. And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka orang-orang yang zalim itu dimusnahkan sampai ke akar-akarnya. Segala puji bagi Allah, Tuhan semesta alam.
